column2: we will post those changes to this privacy statement,

Users will be notified via email prior to a change of ownership or control of their personal information. If as a result of the business transition, the users? personally identifiable information will be used in a manner different from that stated at the time of collection they will be given choice consistent with our notification of changes section.
we will post those changes to this privacy statement
we will notify users via email.
we will post a prominent notice on our Web site notifying users of the change.
we will post those changes to this privacy statement, the homepage, and other places we deem appropriate
